title: GIVE US BACK OUR FORUMS
body:
WHY FORCE US TO BOARDS?

Ever heard the CUSTOMER is ALWAYS right?

If a company or organisation is ever set up it's not what THEY want it's what the community wants. That's what makes the Community like the organisation or company more. Because they listen and pay attention to what their customers want.

If people here actually prefer boards then. Fine keep it.

replies.body:
> Ever heard the CUSTOMER is ALWAYS right?

This attitude tbh isn't always right.

But yes, I don't enjoy board all that much, main reason is that it's just so empty. How many regulars are actually left?

>This attitude tbh isn't always right.

Most the time the customer is just stupid and feels so entitled.
Hasn't felt empty since the forums were shut down. Kinda finding it hard to keep up with some threads now.

From working with tech support and customer support for some places, I have learned that the customer is NEVER right.

And anyone who actually works with consumers will tell you that the "Customer is always right" is the biggest load of horse %%%% to ever come from someone's mouth.
I like that they brought you back. You're not as bad as people say...

Honestly just f**k off, GO seriously! 


if you don't like them too bad WE DO NOT CARE!

"http://i.imgur.com/bnMGL.gif"

I agree with the OP. Wizards of the Coast gutted their community with this BS, and now Riot's done the same. This Web 2.0, social media garbage is nowhere near as good compared to the BBS of yesteryear.

That's not to say Riot's old forums were *good*, mind you. But they should have switched to vBulletin - a system that has worked wonderfully for fifteen years now.
